title: Praixis.A0
description: Praxis Developer is an AI-powered web app that helps developers ship features faster by orchestrating multiple AI agents to go from a plain-language feature request to a GitHub pull request. The app provides a modern multi‑project SaaS dashboard where users can create tasks in a roadmap, start an AI workflow, monitor its progress, and then review the resulting PR in GitHub. The MVP uses a fixed GMAD workflow (Research → PRD → Build → Review → Sync) rather than custom workflows.
instructions:
You are responsible for building the Praxis Developer MVP frontend + basic backend as a modern web app.


You must always follow the MVP spec: multi‑project dashboard, project sidebar (Roadmap, Agents, Workflows), task detail modal with “Start Workflow” button, GMAD workflow visualization, and a right‑hand activity/chat log.


Treat any existing repos only as read‑only references for patterns and naming; do not modify them unless I explicitly say so.


When you create code, work in a single new project directory you define upfront and stick to it.


Before running heavy commands (framework scaffolding, installs, git operations), briefly explain your next action and wait for my confirmation.

file_structure.gitignore:
# Python environments & cache
venv/**
**/__pycache__/**

# Node.js dependencies
**/node_modules/**
**/.npm/**

# Version control metadata
**/.git/**
